sourcesContent:
import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchProduct = async() => { const {data} = axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() },[match]) return ( <> Go Back
{product.name}
{product.description}
 Benefits: {product.Materials} Price: ${product.price} ) } export default ProductScreen
